item.category: Sign plate is missing (Non illuminating sign)

item.title: Dangerous surface, 26th December
item.description:
The bridge over the dual carriageway is really slippery when wet/damp since the renovation works. Have slipped and almost fallen several times since the works despite wearing walking boots. Needs a non slip surface applying
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A417, Elmbridge, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Traffic Island missing its reflective sign in a non illumd, 26th December
item.description:
Traffic Island missing its reflective sign been hit so many times before that it does not exist. It has caused me to collide with it due to non reflective sign in situ. Damage caused to my car includes 2 tyres , 2 wheels ( buckled ), wheel trims 2, tracking needing doing. Gotherington garage owner says this has been like this for some time and gets hit on a weekly basis. I intend to claim for repair costs.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A435, Gotherington, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Complete bollard is damaged (Non illuminating bollard or post)

item.title: Shared cycle path/footpath, 26th December
item.description:
The shared path between Sainsbury's and the Amazon warehouse is slick with wet mulched leaves making for a dangerous slippery surface. The street sweeper needs to clear it before someone has a nasty accident.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Barnett Way, Barnwood, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Previously filled pothole washed out and very deep, 26th December
item.description:
Prestbury High Street near to the entrance to the Lillian Faithful Baytree Nursing home. The pothole was previously filled but has now washed out leaving a very deep hole.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 54, High Street, Noverton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Steps badly worn and dangerous for users, 26th December
item.description:
Public Footpath ACO/5 opposite lay by near seven Springs. On using these steps today slipped on steps into carriageway which was busy and incurred a number of minor injuries. Suggest footpath closed until rectified as a serious problem for users.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A436, Coberley, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road Verge too Wide, 26th December
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Cleevelands Drive, Marle Hill, Cheltenham

item.title: Tree split badly next to pathway/road., 24th December
item.description:
A tree that hangs over the pathway and road, has a split that is over a foot long. The gap at the top of the split is wide enough to put your hand in. It is putting people at risk of injury. The tree is no the grass verge next to the path outside 14 Winterbotham Road.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 14, Winterbotham Road, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
